spec_data.Name: gfal2-plugin-gridftp
spec_data.Description:
Provides the gridftp support (gsiftp://) for gfal2.
The gridftp plugin provides the POSIX operations and
the third party transfer support on the GSIFTP URLs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 09:53:03 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides the gridftp support for gfal2
